courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for both BIOE 310 and IE 300. Prerequisites: BIOE 205 and BIOE 206.
description: Fundamental and applied statistics, including probability distributions, parameter estimation, descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and linear regression. Statistical methods in genomics including sequence analysis, gene expression data analysis, human genomic variation, regulatory genomics, and cancer genomics. Credit is not given for both BIOE 310 and IE 300. Prerequisites: BIOE 205 and BIOE 206.
label: Comp Tools Bio Data
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Bioengineering department.
